txt.en: The Hillmen armourers are encamped south-east of the Ram Dúath.\n\nYou should defeat the armourers before they can craft any more weapons for the Rauta-lehmä.
Special weapons are being forged in the eastern camps for the Rauta-lehmä by the Hillmen of Angmar, who journey down from the mouth of the Ram Dúath.

Special weapons are being forged in the eastern camps for the Rauta-lehmä by the Hillmen of Angmar, who journey down from the mouth of the Ram Dúath.\n\nYou should defeat the Hillmen armourers at their camp, for they pose a great threat to the free peoples of the North Downs.
The Hillmen armourers are encamped south-east of the Ram Dúath.\n\nYou should defeat the amourers before they can craft any more weapons for the Rauta-lehmä.
You succeeded in defeating the Hillmen armourers from Angmar who came to strengthen the Rauta-lehmä.
You succeeded in defeating the Hillmen armourers from Angmar who came to strengthen the Rauta-lehmä.
'You must hunt the armourers from the North! Armed with claws of metal, the Rauta-lehmä will cut my people down like the tall summer grass.'
'Good luck in your battles. If those weapons reach our misguided bretheren, the battles ahead will be bloody.'
Tell Iivari of your victory over the Armourers
